examples: Arisaema peninsulae f. atropurpureum Y.C. Chu & D.C. Wu in Nat. Resources Res.,  2: 4 (1979).
source: IK db. This is a collector from Herb. HNR, Harbin, see Index Herb. Sin.: 233  (1993). See also Bibliog. Chinese Syst. Bot.: 457-458 (1993). Not to be muddled  with Wu, Da Cheng who is at Herb. GNA, Shangyou, see Index Herb. Sin.: 272  (1993).
